text.text: We allow you to track the activity such as events that occurred, top events, and monthly activity on your website and you can also learn about your website traffic. You will be able to see from where most of the users are coming, and how can you improve the quality of your services. We have made it easy for you to track every visitor with the intention in his mind. Getting the true data will allow you to send the email campaigns to the users for more value.
